content: **a perfect quick project to make and give as a gift or to sell at craft shows ** > use code **get1off** at checkout for > $1 off a pattern purchase **size ** one size **stitches & techniques used ** chains slip_stitch single_crochet half double double_crochet **yarn ** #4 worsted weight 2 strands held together we crochet dishie or lion brand wool ease or suitable substitute a = main color b = contrast color the main body of this is worked with 2 strands of worsted weight yarn held together the accent color is worked with just 1 strand of worsted weight yarn a bulky weight yarn can be substituted for the 2 strands of worsted weight held together **tools ** us size i/9 5 5 mm crochet hook yarn needle scissors wood ring 2 9 /7 5 cm across with an inside measurement of 1 9 /4 8 cm **other ** **read through all of the pattern notes before beginning** and please contact me if you ever have any questions about one of my patterns follow me on instagram @simplyhookedbyjanet join my facebook community and connect with other crochet enthusiasts https //www facebook com/groups/simplyhookedbyjanet copyright protected you may not redistribute pattern after purchase or publish any part as your own including photos you may sell finished products and if possible reference back to this pattern and/or give credit to simply hooked by janet as the original designer
